A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The director was given the keys to the corvette and he crashed and burned.

Luke Skywalker is Classic Americana and he was made a punchline.

I can forgive the Force Awakens for being a reboot\, and setting up future movies\, but The Last Jedi did not deliver. It felt like a reboot of a reboot.

Poor writting made for a shallow character played by Laura Dern\, it created a whole nonsensical subplot which included the Finn and Rose characters.

JJ Abrams better fix the franchise fast\, or Disney isn't getting another dime of my money.
